column3: TRAFFIC ALERT FOR NEW CIRCLE RD:
column4: The outer loop is shutdown at Floyd Dr.  Injury collision between Floyd Dr and Meadow Ln.  Downed electric lines and ruptured gas line.  The gas has been shut off.
Inbound Athens Boonesboro Rd just prior to Hays Blvd
Monticello Blvd at Clays Mill Rd
